regularItems.name: hat
regularItems.descr: Hey, how would you like a bit of bling to protect that noggin?'
regularItems.no: 'Probably for the best - you couldn't pull this off anyway'

regularItems.name: fish hook
regularItems.descr: Yo ho ho, any of you wenches want a fish hook? Easy to hang the jib, finding food out here.'
regularItems.no: 'Don't come crying to me when ye lose an eye then'

regularItems.name: bag of fruit
regularItems.descr: Oi, you fancy a little something to ward off the scurvy? Grog only goes so far, eh?'
regularItems.no: 'Shiver me timbers, why do I bother coming out to your man-o-war?'

onSaleItems.name: dagger
onSaleItems.descr: Hey, This here belonged to a king once but I'll give it to you for cheap.'
onSaleItems.yes: 'Just keep that thing pointed away from me'

onSaleItems.name: telescope
onSaleItems.descr: I'm not looking to empty all me coffers, but I have quite the booty to move here - anyone need a spy glass?
onSaleItems.yes: 'Look at you lasses, pleased as pie to hornswaggle an old salt'
onSaleItems.no: 'Well don't you scallywags tell anyone who showed it to ye, savvy?'

onSaleItems.name: sextant
onSaleItems.descr: Hey, I can't leave me hearties to capsize out here - I've got a sextant for cheap if ye have the doubloons.'
onSaleItems.yes: 'Aye, good choice lass. I'm off to take a caulk.'
onSaleItems.no: 'Fine then, feed the fish you scurvy dog'

uselessItems.name: teacup
uselessItems.descr: Afraid there isn't much for the likes of you... how about a lucrative tea cup?'
uselessItems.yes: 'Not the most business savvy pirates, are you?'
uselessItems.no: He leaves in a huff, nosing around the storeroom for a bit

uselessItems.name: pair of shoes
uselessItems.descr: Anyway, shark bait, me thought you sailors could use some slippers for your dance with Jack Ketch... whaddaya say?'
uselessItems.no: The salesman gives a playful smile, leaps onto a rope ladder hanging off the side of the ship, and disappears from view

uselessItems.name: waterlogged book
uselessItems.descr: As it just so happens, I've a book you may fancy... well, it used to be a book. It's about a bunch of lily-livered pirates like yerselves.'
uselessItems.no: 'You know what, it's on the house,' he winks and strolls over to the storeroom.

conversations.greeting: 'Ahoy there, did you know that pirates have unique musical abilities?'
conversations.opA: We're in a bit of a hurry, mate
conversations.outcomeB: 'They can only hit the high C's! Classic.
